title: LK standup

Transcript:
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Do you guys know what? Philip's going to come today.

  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: But, David, you're still only working, like, half the time on exponent, right?
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.

  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: I think there is also I'm suspicious of our routing stuff. Like, I'm not even sure if when your search is only searching through the team that we're specifying right now.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah. I I'm also suspicious of that.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: But I I think I think we'll be able to figure out all of these over the course of this week.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: find the find the data points or, like, construct the data point for it.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Which we can use Karen's new thing for.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay?
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Cool. Yeah, that's definitely the big bottleneck and the big riskiest thing in my opinion, too. Every time we've tried to do evals, it's always taken a lot longer than we thought.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Three.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: So we ran into 11 judge issues with this kind of stuff because sometimes, like, oh, some of these tasks that edges are kind of okay if they have or not, and it's not very useful to put an accuracy number for them. But I was actually a little. I was looking at a Mercos business just yesterday randomly and what Mercor does for.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: The labs is they'll hire these PhD level scientists or lawyers or whatever, and they'll have them write rubrics. Actually.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: And for tasks. And they'll write really detailed rubrics so that them labs can do RL on them. I know. That's actually kind of interesting.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Because with evals, we just assume that linear, like when your search has returned these issues and like, this is what we're working with context wise.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Yeah.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: enhancement after the fact.
  - 07b084d9-6eab-410e-bad8-2bdfc900b4d0|david r: Yes, for me it is. But it's wet and sticky. It's never good.
  - 07b084d9-6eab-410e-bad8-2bdfc900b4d0|david r: But. Yeah. How's the weather over there?
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: It's just the same. It's just always, like, 50 to 60.
  - 07b084d9-6eab-410e-bad8-2bdfc900b4d0|david r: They're usually clear in California or, like, in the Bay.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Where I live, but not everywhere in San Francisco.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: I'm going to enable extraction for project exposure.

  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: I did that.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah. Sorry. I saw your message.

  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Mhmm.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Keep wait for him. Should I? Quick question for you Camille, while we wait. I was working. Oh, no worries. So I was started working on fast eval capture for debugging real issues and I wasn't exactly sure what linear context to capture the way that I have it right now in sharing.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: So I made a new page where you can just paste in either like a Slack thread or a PR URL or Nature script title, and then you can select a linear team. And right now I'm just pulling the 50 most recent issues from the team because. Yeah, but then I realized this might be tough unless we went back and like, retroactively under the operation that they did incorrectly or something. So, like, would it be more helpful to save the 50 most recent issues at the point in which we extracted and then like, say that to the database and pull it or something?
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: May maybe we just
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: actually
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: do specific linear issues.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Then we can go
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: fix it after the fact.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: I
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: What do you mean by that?
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Okay. So two two things here. One is that
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: for these test cases, you usually don't need the whole linear board. You just you just need, like, the few issues that are at
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: fault here. So if it's like a ticket creation, you actually don't need any issues at all.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Right? Yeah.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: If it's, like, if it's updating, you can just pick the those few issues.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Then if you have only a few issues, then, like, maybe once you've generated the test case,
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: can just go and edit it manually to, like,
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: rewind, and it's not that bad.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Capturing all that, and you just go in and and, like, fix the
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Oh, wait. Sounds good. Then maybe won't populate any of winter stuff.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: interview to not interview or whatever.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Okay. Yeah, I got you. Okay, so right now it just downloads the file and then what? The truth is, but it sounds like we can just manually populate that. I don't need to list the issues.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah. I think that's okay.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Okay, cool.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: You can just copy paste some issue issue numbers.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Sounds good.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yo.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Look at the model is called five zero.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: It's off 5, though. I think it's a 5 something. 5 something. 5. I don't know.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Cool. All right. Should we just first update on all the work from last time?
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay. I'm adding a section for you guys up here, actually.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Do you guys want to just write into your name?
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay, Wait, did you guys reprioritize? Is David working on something else besides.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: The things that Justin raised in the division. Doc, Updates we talked about yesterday.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: David speaking.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah, I DM'd him that there are a couple of small ramp up tasks that he can take first.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Including, like, posting and slack after extracting a recording or stuff like that.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah. And then when we actually move something to interview because the PR was related to it, like, we should link it in linear so we know what's up. Right now it just says in review, and we don't know why.
  - 07b084d9-6eab-410e-bad8-2bdfc900b4d0|david r: Right now.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Okay?
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Sounds good.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay. And then come out. We should be getting.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Updates from Exponent for old meeting transcript and slack combos now.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yes.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay. And then I go to which board to check amount.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Just the one called X exponent mirror.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah. I I
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: exponent mirror because that was the only exponent board that I saw.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: It should be mirror.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay, I don't know what exponent local is.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Exponent local is just, a local debugging board for us.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Wait, why is create intercom connector on our board?
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Oh, is this everyone? Is this across everybody?
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: There there's something really funny going on here. I'm not I'm not sure why
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: this is on our board.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: This is yeah. This is something I wanna look into
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: today.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: I think it should not be going here.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay, do we need a better way to test this stuff? Because it seems like there's a lot of bugs with.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Our exponent flows that we only find.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Days later because we had to wait for actual meetings to happen.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: I think this like,
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: integration level stuff is kinda hard to
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: have test for.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: We'll have the evals for, like, the quality problems.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Maybe logs will at least let us know how this happened.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah. There there are definitely logs which
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: can go back and look at.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay?
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: I can put that on my list.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Cool.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: I think these, like, integration issues are, there there aren't that many of them, and
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: we'll see them happen.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Right.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay, and then how are you guys playing to generate the eval?
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: So I think for
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: meetings, I'm just gonna go look at some meeting transcripts and
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: manually
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: write up what tasks I think should
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: be there from it.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Slack, I think we already have a little bit of
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: evals. And then I think beyond that, it's
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: as things happen and we see quality issues,
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah. The other thing that Erin and I are adding to the
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: framework is
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: So I just make sure.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: making it so we have ground truth for everything. We have an LM comparison so we can
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: continuously run these and make sure that quality hasn't regressed.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Yeah, okay.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Actually one way you could even do LM judging in this case.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Is. You could even write, like, a plain text rubric for each data point. Actually.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Actually maybe a better way for us to do LM the Judge.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: In our case, too, because you can just say, like, for this data point, make sure you get these three tickets and then the other tickets. It's okay if you have them or not.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Mhmm.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah. That that makes sense to me.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: And it actually makes it easier for a human to onboard onto this eval too. They just read that stuff and they without having to read the whole transcript.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: What's up?
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Are you saying? Instead of like a fixed ground truth, like JSON, something to compare against? It's more of just like text.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Oh. And so I think. I think having a ground truth is good, but then additionally, maybe having, like, a plain text note on how to evaluate this.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Got it.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Structure.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: That makes sense.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Yeah.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay. Yeah. So I think the main thing is really just.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: You need the ground truth at all, or is it okay to just write the text description?
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Like, expect these three tasks to exist
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: This task should have gotten updated.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: To
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Yeah, it's probably okay to do either, I guess. I'm guessing having a ground truth will still be easier, though.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Even for, like, a human to parse. Like, just go on. An example of good tickets would have been.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Mhmm.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Yeah. Fair fair enough.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Okay, cool. Yeah. So however you guys can. I would just put as much urgency and risk mitigation on the eval.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: And like everything else, you can hopefully just be done in time, in between to filter gaps or whatever may happen.
  - cd1e047b-b8ba-40c4-bcec-0abd2d1a45e1|Kumail: Mhmm.
  - f0518383-55e5-4181-8fe2-3c60fb64fc13|phillip: Karen, I know grinding evals is not your most favorite thing, but hopefully collecting eval is not as bad as granting the eval.
  - 5286e8d4-e5dc-4bad-b08d-4d0227c18a13|karen: Yeah, makes sense.
